p: For examination of which bioclimatic variables were driving the models, we used "Permutation Importance". This represents a measure of decrease in training AUC resulting from randomly permuting values of that variable during the training phase of model development; thus, the decrease in training AUC is proportional to the importance of that variable to the model [ 25]. All modified parameters listed above were common across each species' Maxent model, with the exception of the bias files.
